summary: This is an email from Pete Eir transmitting an index for a document production related to the Epstein case, with apologies for delay. The email contains confidentiality and privilege warnings.

persons.name: Pete Eir
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email transmitting an index for document production, apologizing for delay in delivery.

events.title: Transmission of document production index
events.description: Pete Eir sends an email with an attached index for a document production, apologizing for the delay.

keyFacts: An index for a document production related to the Epstein case was transmitted via email on March 14, 2019.
The sender, Pete Eir, apologized for a delay in providing the index.
The email contains strong confidentiality and privilege warnings, indicating the sensitive nature of the attached materials.
